content: Our service packages are monthly and designed for fast time-to-value. Most clients launch within 14–30 days depending on scope.
Typical delivery: Discovery (2–3 days) → Build (7–14 days) → QA (2–4 days) → Launch.
We implement technical SEO basics (metadata, headings, performance, mobile) and provide an on-page checklist for ongoing optimization.
Static sites reduce attack surface. We still apply HTTPS, forms hardening, and uptime monitoring best practices.
This template includes a retrieval-based FAQ assistant. You can expand it with your own CSV knowledge base.
